name: Wonder World (kneumiller)
description:
WebGL version here: https://kneumiller.itch.io/wonderworld

Use your powers as a void to absorb these odd inhabitants and use their powers to surprise and stun others to gain their powers as well.

This is a single level puzzle game where the goal is to bribe the giraficonda to let you out with his favorite, blue berry pie.

I was not able to finish the sound design or text for each character. These text boxes from characters would help in finding their weakness that either stuns them or breaks their guard so you can absorb them.

Void Boi - 

Move: "WASD

Absorb enemies: Spacebar

Switch between absorbed characters: QE

Absorbed characters-

Special ability: Spacebar

Please leave comments if you actually try this game out haha. I can provide context and clues to help "absorb" each character in the game if anyone wants to try and beat it.
